name: Wizard vs Mechapead
description:
MADE IN UNDER 3 DAYS!

i got super sick and was absent most of the jam, got well enough where i saw that there was 3 days left, i started from scratch and made a turn based strategy game! controls and how to play are in the game! enjoy

Music:

The following music was used for this media project:

Music: Cantakerous Collisions by Tim Kulig

Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/10717-cantakerous-collisions
